name: @toMNI_Awarp
author: AFNI Developers
description: Transforms skull-stripped datasets to 1x1x1 mm MNI space using an affine transformation.

inputs.description: Name of the directory to be created where results will be stored.
inputs.name: Directory

inputs.description: List of datasets to be transformed.
inputs.name: Datasets

output-files.description: The transformed datasets in 1x1x1 mm MNI space.
output-files.name: Transformed Datasets
